content.description: A four-week summer intensive language which is a continuation of CHI 303C. This course is designed to further improve students' facility in written and oral expression through a close study of essays written by influential Chinese intellectuals on issues of women's emancipation, family systems, and modernization. Prerequisites: CHI 303C or equivalent. The course consists of five two-hour classes and five two-hour drill sessions weekly, plus individual tutorial sessions.
content.name: Third-Year Modern Chinese II
